mapper.select:
select jwi.seq_id , jpi.prd_cd , jpi.jan_cd , jpi.prd_nm , jpi.std_info , jpi.prd_unit_prc , jii.now_prd_cnt , jii.prd_qty , jii.prd_case , jii.prd_bara , date_format(jii.exp_dt, '%Y/%m/%d') exp_dt , jii.sell_prc , jpi.partner_id , jpi.partner_nm , jpi.brand_nm , jpi.prd_cnt , jpi.dsku , jpi.dasin , jpi.tax_incld , jpi.tax_rt , date_format(jwi.warehouse_dt, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') warehouse_dt , date_format(jwi.delivery_dt, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') delivery_dt , date_format(jii.reg_dt, '%Y/%m/%d') reg_dt , date_format(jii.upd_dt, '%Y/%m/%d') upd_dt from jaiko_prd_info jpi inner join jaiko_inventory_info jii on jii.jan_cd = jpi.jan_cd left outer join jaiko_warehouse_info jwi on jwi.jan_cd = jpi.jan_cd
jpi.jan_cd = #{jan_cd}
jwi.delivery_dt between date_format (#{from_dt}, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') and date_format (#{to_dt}, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s')
jii.upd_dt between date_add(now(), interval -1 hour) and now()
order by jii.upd_dt desc, jwi.seq_id desc
